item.title: Trajectory Prediction for Cruise Autonomous Cars
item.description:
• Developed data, pre-processing and modeling pipeline for Transformers, GNNs-based trajectory prediction architecture that acts on vectorized map and agent information.
  • Improved prediction quality through lossless and long-range feature representation, reduced prediction latency by 20%, and improved training and validation speeds by 33%.

item.title: Visual Intelligence Analytics for FMCG Brands
item.description:
• Built deep-learning pipelines using object detection, segmentation, fine-grained classification and self-supervised learning for retailers like Kimberly Clark, P&G, Loweâ€™s, Coke and ABInBev to provide real-time competitive intelligence and on-shelf execution insights.
  • Achieved >97% accuracy in detecting the smallest of SKUs and lifted per-store sales by 5%.
